required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Kinesio Taping on Chronic Nonspecific Low Back Pain
clinical_study.official_title: Effects of Kinesio Taping on Chronic Nonspecific Low Back Pain: a Randomized Controlled Trial

lead_sponsor.agency: Universidade Federal do Rio Grande do Norte

clinical_study.source: Universidade Federal do Rio Grande do Norte

brief_summary.textblock: This study propose analyze the effects of Kinesio Taping® in chronic nonspecific low back pain. All the subjects will be submitted to an evaluation of the painful sensation, functional performance, trunk range of motion and neuromuscular performance at three different times.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Evaluation of pain sensation three days after the application of the tape.
primary_outcome.description: Pain sensation measured by pain numerical rating scale

arm_group.description: It will not apply any tape.
Apply the KT with tension in the erector spine muscles.
Apply the KT without tension in the erector spine muscles.
Apply Micropore tape in the erector spine muscles.

intervention.description: Application of Kinesio Taping with tension in the erector spine muscles.
Application of Kinesio Taping without tension in the erector spine muscles.
Application of Micropore tape in the erector spine muscles.

facility.name: Universidade Federal do Rio Grande do Norte

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: Universidade Federal do Rio Grande do Norte
